title: ActInf OrgStream #003.1 ~ Bijan Khezri
description:
Bijan Khezri
https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-030-95473-4
"Governing Continuous Transformation: Re-framing the Strategy-Governance Conversation"
Introduces the new concept of Free-Energy Governance by transposing neuroscientific principles to governance
Provides a new approach to continuous strategic renewal and transformation
Combines practice-based knowledge with well-founded research
